name: FwoompPUNK
description:
An official in-between story after Offroad 2089. Featuring the Kobold Scientist. But how'd he end up so big? Why does he become the merchant? ALL THESE QUESTIONS ARE ANSWERED IN THIS GAME!

Features REAL softbody physics! A metroidvania inspired map layout, and a TECHNO soundtrack in a PS1 inspired graphical style with 2.5D ENVIRONMENT.

WARNING: THIS GAME HAS ROUND ANIMALS! DO NOT PLAY IF YOU HATE BIG HECKIN CHONKERS.
